content:
alexcrichton commented on issue #2810:

I ended up handling this in https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/3023 so I'm going to close this, but thanks regardless for the work here!

rgrmrts commented on issue #2810:

Sorry I went AWOL on this - I’ve been on medical leave and have not been coding for the past few months. Thanks for linking the PR, it’ll be useful for me to take a look. Cheers!
